scripts.start: npm run replica && npm run deploy && npm run mint
scripts.replica: dfx stop && dfx start --clean --background && dfx canister create staging --identity anonymous && dfx canister create ledger
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:staging && npm run deploy:ledger
scripts.deploy-qq: npm run deploy:staging -- -qq && npm run deploy:ledger -- -qq
scripts.deploy:staging: dfx canister create staging --identity anonymous && DFX_MOC_PATH="$(vessel bin)/moc" dfx deploy staging --identity anonymous --mode reinstall -y --argument '(principal "'$(dfx canister id staging --identity anonymous)'")'
scripts.upgrade:staging: dfx canister stop staging --identity anonymous && DFX_MOC_PATH="$(vessel bin)/moc" dfx deploy staging --identity anonymous --upgrade-unchanged --argument '(principal "'$(dfx canister id staging --identity anonymous)'")' && dfx canister start staging --identity anonymous
scripts.deploy:ledger: dfx canister create ledger && DFX_MOC_PATH="$(vessel bin)/moc" dfx deploy ledger --mode reinstall -y --argument '(record {minting_account = "e82226d3101bd8525111e2c6501a79365f2484d82d3f2be96269b78fe200eeaa"; initial_values = vec { record { "8b61ff722d7e6321eb99bb607ab0cf323b3c64b43d6a13c245c8a4e197f7b38b"; record { e8s=1_000_000_000_000_000 } }; }; send_whitelist = vec {}})'
scripts.mint: dfx canister call staging addAsset '(record {name = "privat";payload = record {ctype = "text/html"; data = vec {blob "hello world!"} } })' --identity anonymous && dfx canister call staging initMint --identity anonymous && dfx canister call staging shuffleTokensForSale --identity anonymous && dfx canister call staging enableSale --identity anonymous
scripts.mint-2: dfx canister call staging addAsset '(record {name = "privat0";payload = record {ctype = "text/html"; data = vec {blob "hello world0!"} } })' --identity anonymous && dfx canister call staging addAsset '(record {name = "privat1";payload = record {ctype = "text/html"; data = vec {blob "hello world1!"} } })' --identity anonymous && dfx canister call staging initMint --identity anonymous && dfx canister call staging shuffleTokensForSale --identity anonymous && dfx canister call staging enableSale --identity anonymous
scripts.enable-sale: dfx canister call staging enableSale --identity anonymous
scripts.test:pending-sale: npm run env pending-sale && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint && vitest run pending-sale
scripts.test:public-sale: npm run env public-sale && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint && vitest run public-sale
scripts.test:highload-sale: npm run env highload-sale && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint && vitest run highload-sale
scripts.test:whitelist-sale: npm run env whitelist-sale && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint && vitest run whitelist-sale
scripts.test:whitelist-slots: npm run env whitelist-slots && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint && vitest run whitelist-slots
scripts.test:marketplace: npm run env marketplace && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint && vitest run marketplace
scripts.test:fees: npm run env fees && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint && vitest run fees
scripts.test:sold-out: npm run env sold-out && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint && vitest run sold-out
scripts.test:single-asset: npm run env single-asset && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint && vitest run single-asset.test.ts
scripts.test:multi-asset: npm run env multi-asset && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint-2 && vitest run multi-asset
scripts.test:single-asset-delayed-reveal: npm run env single-asset-delayed-reveal && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint-2 && dfx canister call staging shuffleTokensForSale --identity anonymous && vitest run single-asset-delayed-reveal
scripts.test:backup: npm run env backup && npm run deploy-qq && npm run mint && vitest run backup
scripts.test:restore: npm run env restore && npm run deploy-qq && vitest run restore
scripts.test: npm run test:single-asset && npm run test:multi-asset && npm run test:single-asset-delayed-reveal && npm run test:pending-sale && npm run test:public-sale && npm run test:highload-sale && npm run test:whitelist-sale && npm run test:whitelist-slots && npm run test:marketplace && npm run test:fees && npm run test:sold-out && npm run test:backup &&  && npm run test:restore
